data.title: Illinois Institute of Technology
data.meta_description: Illinois Tech offers its students the best of both worlds: a diverse, welcoming campus community located in one the world’s great metropolises, Chicago. The 10 students you’re about to meet showcase how this dynamic university lays the foundation for a world-class education, one that blends guaranteed hands-on experiences with individualized career planning, providing students for successful careers.
data.text: Illinois Institute of Technology is a one-of-a-kind university that empowers its students through powerful hands-on experiences. Founded in 1890, this world-class private university, located in Chicago, offers high-value degree programs in engineering, computing, science, architecture, business, design, law, and the humanities. Illinois Tech’s unique education centers on its Elevate Your Future program, which guarantees students experiences such as internships and research projects, plus a team of mentors who help students craft their own customized academic and career plans. The result: students graduate with the twenty-first century skills they need to launch a great career.
